description:
cmd/go: do not ignore DepsErrors in 'go run'

Fixes issue 3490.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM.

An observation, pack exits with 0 when asked to pack an empty directory, I'm not sure of the use cases around packing an empty directly (you do get a small .a file), but this might have made the error a little easier to spot.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1d4d8324085b ***

cmd/go: do not ignore DepsErrors in 'go run'

Fixes issue 3490.

R=golang-dev, dave, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6040046

Committer: Russ Cox <rsc@golang.org>

subject: code review 6040046: cmd/go: do not ignore DepsErrors in 'go run'
